parts.text:
```json
{
  "trip_summary": {
    "from": "Okinawa",
    "to": "Shinjuku",
    "best_travel_options": [
      "Flight from Okinawa (OKA) to Tokyo (NRT or HND), then train or subway to Shinjuku."
    ],
    "estimated_budget_range": "$300 - $1000",
    "summary_description": "Travel from Okinawa to Shinjuku involves a flight to either Narita (NRT) or Haneda (HND) airport in Tokyo, followed by a train or subway ride to Shinjuku. This itinerary focuses on attractions and food in Shinjuku.",
    "image_url": "https://example.com/shinjuku_skyline.jpg"
  },
  "transportation": [
    [
      {
        "method": "Flight",
        "service_provider": "Japan Airlines",
        "service_number": "JAL 904",
        "from": "Naha Airport (OKA)",
        "to": "Haneda Airport (HND)",
        "departure_terminal": null,
        "arrival_terminal": null,
        "duration": "2h 30m",
        "cost_range": "$100 - $300",
        "booking_link": "https://www.jal.co.jp/en/",
        "icon_url": "https://www.jal.co.jp/cms/resources/ja/common/logo/jal_logo.svg",
        "image_url": "https://example.com/japan_airlines_plane.jpg"
      },
      {
        "method": "Train",
        "service_provider": "JR Yamanote Line",
        "service_number": null,
        "from": "Haneda Airport Terminal 1-2 Station",
        "from_platform": null,
        "to": "Shinjuku Station",
        "to_platform": null,
        "duration": "35 min",
        "cost_range": "$5 - $10",
        "seat_class": "Unreserved",
        "booking_link": "https://www.jreast.co.jp/e/",
        "icon_url": "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/92/JR_East_Yamanote_Line_color.svg/2560px-JR_East_Yamanote_Line_color.svg.png",
        "image_url": "https://example.com/yamanote_line.jpg"
      }
    ],
    [
      {
        "method": "Flight",
        "service_provider": "All Nippon Airways (ANA)",
        "service_number": "ANA 474",
        "from": "Naha Airport (OKA)",
        "to": "Narita International Airport (NRT)",
        "departure_terminal": null,
        "arrival_terminal": null,
        "duration": "2h 45m",
        "cost_range": "$120 - $350",
        "booking_link": "https://www.ana.co.jp/en/",
        "icon_url": "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/ff/All_Nippon_Airways_logo.svg/2560px-All_Nippon_Airways_logo.svg.png",
        "image_url": "https://example.com/ana_plane.jpg"
      },
      {
        "method": "Bus",
        "service_provider": "Airport Limousine Bus",
        "service_number": null,
        "from": "Narita Airport",
        "departure_gate": null,
        "to": "Shinjuku Station West Exit",
        "all_major_stops": [
          "Narita Airport Terminal 1",
          "Narita Airport Terminal 2",
          "Narita Airport Terminal 3",
          "Shinjuku Station"
        ],
        "duration": "1h 30m - 2h",
        "cost_range": "$25 - $35",
        "booking_link": "https://www.limousinebus.co.jp/en/",
        "icon_url": "https://www.limousinebus.co.jp/img/common/logo.gif",
        "image_url": "https://example.com/limousine_bus.jpg"
      }
    ]
  ],
  "accommodations": [],
  "attractions": [
    {
      "name": "Shinjuku Gyoen National Garden",
      "description": "A beautiful garden blending Japanese, English, and French garden styles. Great for a peaceful escape from the city.",
      "best_time_to_visit": "Spring (cherry blossoms) or Autumn (foliage)",
      "entry_fee": "$5",
      "location": "11 Naitomachi, Shinjuku City, Tokyo 160-0014",
      "representative_image_url": "https://example.com/shinjuku_gyoen.jpg"
    },
    {
      "name": "Tokyo Metropolitan Government Building",
      "description": "Offers panoramic views of Tokyo from its free observation decks. A great way to see the city skyline.",
      "best_time_to_visit": "Daytime for clear views, nighttime for city lights",
      "entry_fee": "Free",
      "location": "2 Chome-8-1 Nishishinjuku, Shinjuku City, Tokyo 163-8001",
      "representative_image_url": "https://example.com/tokyo_metro_gov_building.jpg"
    },
    {
      "name": "Kabukicho",
      "description": "Shinjuku's entertainment district, known for its vibrant nightlife, restaurants, bars, and themed cafes. Also home to the Robot Restaurant.",
      "best_time_to_visit": "Evening and Night",
      "entry_fee": "Free (but activities within have costs)",
      "location": "Kabukicho, Shinjuku City, Tokyo 160-0021",
      "representative_image_url": "https://example.com/kabukicho.jpg"
    }
  ],
  "food_recommendations": [
    {
      "dish_name": "Ramen",
      "short_description": "Shinjuku is known for its diverse ramen scene. Try different styles from various regions of Japan.",
      "best_place_to_try": "Ichiran Shinjuku Central East Entrance",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/shinjuku_ramen.jpg"
    },
    {
      "dish_name": "Yakitori",
      "short_description": "Grilled chicken skewers, a popular and flavorful street food.",
      "best_place_to_try": "Omoide Yokocho (Memory Lane)",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/shinjuku_yakitori.jpg"
    },
    {
      "dish_name": "Tempura",
      "short_description": "Lightly battered and deep-fried seafood and vegetables.",
      "best_place_to_try": " Tsunahachi, Shinjuku Takashimaya",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/shinjuku_tempura.jpg"
    },
    {
      "dish_name": "Sushi",
      "short_description": "Fresh and expertly prepared sushi and sashimi.",
      "best_place_to_try": "Sushi Zanmai, Shinjuku",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/shinjuku_sushi.jpg"
    },
    {
      "dish_name": "Omurice",
      "short_description": "A popular Western-influenced Japanese dish consisting of an omelet made with fried rice and usually topped with ketchup.",
      "best_place_to_try": "Rakeru Shinjuku",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/shinjuku_omurice.jpg"
    }
  ],
  "travel_tips": [
    "Purchase a Japan Rail Pass if you plan to travel extensively by train.",
    "Consider purchasing a Suica or Pasmo card for easy payment on trains and buses.",
    "Learn basic Japanese phrases for easier communication.",
    "Carry cash as some smaller establishments may not accept credit cards.",
    "Be aware of rush hour on trains and subways (7:30-9:30 AM and 5:00-7:00 PM)."
  ]
}
```
